title: Chase Hamilton
summary: A portfolio website made for a friend of mine. This site was designed to showcase his debate coaching ethos so he could reach debate students nationwide.
long_summary: A portfolio website made for a friend of mine. This site was designed to showcase his debate coaching ethos so he could reach debate students nationwide. In the end he coached many students, some becoming finalists.

gallery.caption: The site allows the client to edit individual sections and add new testimonials very easily.
And of course, the site is mobily beautiful, as all sites should be.
